Steps.Message: Update at 08:29 - Engineers are on their way. At this point we think the issue is a fault with some equipment in your local substation in the Balvernie Close area. We did not know this was going to happen, so timeframes we provide throughout are estimated, and are subject to change. Currently we don't have an estimated time frame, however as soon as one is available we will be in touch. All of our texts are manually written and sent personally by our team, and we will be in touch again when we arrive on site.

We became aware of a power cut at 07:25. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing
